# autorepeat

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating how the receiver responds to mouse events.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var autorepeat: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the first mouse down will do one increment (decrement), and, after a delay of 0.5 seconds, will increment (decrement) at a rate of ten times per second. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the receiver will do one increment (decrement) on a mouse up. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]

## Specifying how stepper cell responds

- **valueWraps**: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver wraps around the minimum and maximum values.
